text: So Question. Does this mean we can insert any video hosting service info into HubSpot? Or non service like if we wanted to track html5 vids?

> Does this mean we can insert any video hosting service info into HubSpot?
It _depends._ What I mean is not all platforms may have APIs for getting some of the detailed data that we support at this time.

For example getting an individual’s media play events.

An example of the CMS side of Media Bridge is available on GitHub <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-media-bridge>
I remember when you went from 2 groups [3 levels] to 3 groups [4 levels]. At this point, just make the limit something crazy like 10 groups and forget about it :slightly_smiling_face:

Steve, if we did that I wouldn’t be able to make this joke again.
“So we herd you like groups, so we put groups in your groups, in your groups, in your groups,  so you can group fields in your groups, in your groups, in your groups.”
I accept that meme’s age and how it dates me :laugh:
